page.title: 06Parbold Hilldale Transport
page.content: Most families have their own private car so the public transport is not well used.The nearest BRITISH RAIL station is in Parbold to the south of our area, on the Southport to Wigan line.The RIBBLE bus serves the area of Bispham Green-Hilldale-Parbold on its journeys between Ormskirk and Wigan.It takes 33 minutes to Ormskirk from Bispham Green and 50 minutes to Wigan.A private coach picks up children who attend private schools at Scarisbrick and Ormskirk.A mobile fish van comes from Fleetwood once a week.The mobile library comes to park near shops in south Parbold (outside area).A mobile chiropody van comes to offer treatment.MEALS ON WHEELS are taken to the elderly by volunteer workers (WRVS).
